Key Match Events: Aaron Civale allowed only two hits in his first seven-inning start since last July
William Contreras scored for a 3-0 lead with a stolen run
Post-Match Reflections: The Brewers have been playing like the team they hope to be in October
The Brewers moved to 21 games over.500
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Ashby hit 99 mph on the stadium radar gun
Jackson Chourio delivered a two-run double
Others: The Brewers added a half-game on the idle Cubs and lead the division by 9 1/2 games with 29 to go
